name: Final Verdict
description:

Let justice be done, though heaven falls

Court’s in session! You’re eager to start at your new job as judge of spirits between the realms of the passed and the afterlife. You’ll be handing out final verdicts for these people’s new beginnings based on past memories. Your boss gives you the creeps though, he seems to be busy all the time.

This mystery / sorting game will keep you on your toes to find out more pieces of information as you begin to question morality. Accompanied by cute graphics and different variety of musical tracks this - maybe not so wholesome story - truly comes to life as you stop and start questioning the way things are handled in this courtroom.
